issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: REPL DUMP is leaking metastore connections

comments.body:
GitHub user maheshk114 opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/429

    HIVE-20511 : REPL DUMP is leaking metastore connections

    

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/maheshk114/hive HIVE-20511

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/hive/pull/429.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #429
    
----
commit 5eb4e4652ed6e0e1326a62383de71c78575802d2
Author: Mahesh Kumar Behera <mbehera@...>
Date:   2018-09-06T15:45:57Z

    HIVE-20511 : REPL DUMP is leaking metastore connections

----
